body:
After updating to HEAD today, my whole system broke. This may not only have to do with spack but also with the centOS upgrades.

Anyway, now every `spack module <> refresh -y` call has no effect. I see no errors but also no env modules are created anymore. Meanwhile I removed all to start "fresh" and now I am here without any.

I already resetted everything and initialized spack from scratch, no success.

Does anyone have any idea what might be the problem? I can install formulas but not generate env modules anymore.

(Calling `module` brings up the system installed lmod overview screen. )
title: spack module <> does not generate env modules anymore
